column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Shrimp and grits were good! Wish I would've gotten more grits. Plenty of shrimp tho. Not too cheesy
column2: great flavor. My homegirls for the ribs chilaquiles and the presentation was horrible. It looked like meatloaf. She said the food was good tho but I would've positioned the meat in the center and the chips on the outside so one can see that entire entree.
